name: The Exchange Student: Episode 2 - Point Club
name_original: The Exchange Student: Episode 2 - Point Club
description:
The Exchange Student: Episode 2 - Point Club is an adventure game developed by Pan Metron Ariston. It came out on 11-10-2007. Pan Metron Ariston published the game.
You can play The Exchange Student: Episode 2 - Point Club on PC.
